title.narrative: 3.1. INCLUSIVE AND EQUITABLE EDUCATION OUTCOMES FOR ALL CHILDREN.

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Safe And Equitable Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Services And Practices, Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Systems And Empowerment Of Communities. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: UNICEF draw on the SDG4 national and global targets to boost the Government of Armenia’s commitments on improving equity and quality of education by supporting the ongoing education sector analysis, planning and monitoring efforts, as well as the improvement of inclusive learning environments and enhancement of system resilience to address the dual emergency;;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2022
